verbs.description: russian sub fleet capable of [V: firing] [ARG1: missiles armed with nukes hypersonics] will be ready by 2024 in order to finance eight of the submarines moscow cut funding for other military modernization programs such as the nation surface vessel fleet according to a source who spoke to cnbc on the condition of anonymity cnbc russia united states navy u s united states strategic command washington commander senate armed services committee vladimir putin president gen john hyten u s navy pacific fleets u s strategic command hypersonics air force russian navy hiroshima gen john hyten moscow
